CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The photovoltaic properties of the resulting polymers were investigated with a conventional device structure of ITO / PEDOT : PSS ( 40 nm ) / polym e r : P C 7^1 B M ( 8^0 n m ) / p o l y [ ( 9 , 9 -b i s ( 3 ′ -( N , Ndimethylamino)propyl)-2,7-fluorene)-alt-2,7-(9,9-dioctylfluorene) ] ( PFN ) ( 5 nm ) / Al ( 100 nm ) , here a thin layer of PFN was employed as the cathode interlayer since it can improve the electron extraction.

Let's think step by step.

1. ITO: Indium Tin Oxide
2. PEDOT : PSS: Poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene):poly(styrenesulfonate)
3. polym e r: Unknown, the name of the polymer is not explicitly stated in the text.
4. P C 7^1 B M: Unknown, the name of the polymer is not explicitly stated in the text. It seems to be a part of the name of the third polymer.
5. ( 9 , 9 -b i s ( 3 ′ -( N , Ndimethylamino)propyl)-2,7-fluorene)-alt-2,7-(9,9-dioctylfluorene) : Poly(9,9-bis(3′-(N,N-dimethylamino)propyl)-2,7-fluorene)-alt-2,7-(9,9-dioctylfluorene), also known as PFN
6. Al: Aluminum.

So, the Material Name entities in the paragraph are Indium Tin Oxide, PEDOT : PSS, Unknown Polymer 1, Unknown Polymer 2 (P C 7^1 B M), Poly(9,9-bis(3′-(N,N-dimethylamino)propyl)-2,7-fluorene)-alt-2,7-(9,9-dioctylfluorene) (PFN), and Aluminum.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

The relevant Material Name entities in the paragraph are:

1. Indium Tin Oxide (ITO)
2. Poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene):poly(styrenesulfonate) (PEDOT : PSS)
3. Unknown Polymer 1 (polym e r)
4. Unknown Polymer 2 (P C 7^1 B M)
5. Poly(9,9-bis(3′-(N,N-dimethylamino)propyl)-2,7-fluorene)-alt-2,7-(9,9-dioctylfluorene) (PFN)
6. Aluminum (Al)

These are the entities in the paragraph that clearly refer to specific materials used in the photovoltaic device structure.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| Indium Tin Oxide (ITO) |
| Poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene):poly(styrenesulfonate) (PEDOT : PSS) |
| Unknown Polymer 1 (polym e r) |
| Unknown Polymer 2 (P C 7^1 B M) |
| Poly(9,9-bis(3′-(N,N-dimethylamino)propyl)-2,7-fluorene)-alt-2,7-(9,9-dioctylfluorene) (PFN) |
| Aluminum (Al) |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The photovoltaic properties of the resulting polymers were investigated with a conventional device structure of ITO / PEDOT : PSS ( 40 nm ) / polym e r : P C 7^1 B M ( 8^0 n m ) / p o l y [ ( 9 , 9 -b i s ( 3 ′ -( N , Ndimethylamino)propyl)-2,7-fluorene)-alt-2,7-(9,9-dioctylfluorene) ] ( PFN ) ( 5 nm ) / Al ( 100 nm ) , here a thin layer of PFN was employed as the cathode interlayer since it can improve the electron extraction.

Let's think step by step.

1. ITO: Indium Tin Oxide, a conductive material used as a transparent electrode in the photovoltaic device.
2. PEDOT : PSS: Poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene):poly(styrenesulfonate), a conducting polymer used as a hole transport layer in the photovoltaic device.
3. polym e r : Unknown, assuming it's a specific polymer used in the photovoltaic device.
4. P C 7^1 B M: Unknown, assuming it's a specific polymer used in the photovoltaic device.
5. 8^0 nm: Thickness of the P C 7^1 B M layer.
6. p o l y [ ( 9 , 9 -b i s ( 3 ′ -( N , Ndimethylamino)propyl)-2,7-fluorene)-alt-2,7-(9,9-dioctylfluorene) ]: A specific conducting polymer used as the emissive layer in the photovoltaic device, named PFN.
7. 5 nm: Thickness of the PFN layer.
8. Al: Aluminum, a conductive material used as the anode in the photovoltaic device.
9. 100 nm: Thickness of the aluminum layer.

So, the property values in the paragraph are:

1. 40 nm: Thickness of PEDOT : PSS layer.
2. 8^0 nm: Thickness of P C 7^1 B M layer.
3. 5 nm: Thickness of PFN layer.
4. 100 nm: Thickness of aluminum layer.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. 40 nm: Thickness of PEDOT : PSS layer.
2. 8^0 nm: Thickness of P C 7^1 B M layer.
3. 5 nm: Thickness of PFN layer.
4. Unknown thickness of the ITO layer (not explicitly stated in the paragraph).
5. Unknown thickness of the Al layer (not explicitly stated in the paragraph).

So, the relevant property values in the paragraph are the thicknesses of the different layers in the photovoltaic device structure.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| Thickness of PEDOT : PSS layer: 40 nm |
| Thickness of P C 7^1 B M layer: 8^0 nm |
| Thickness of PFN layer: 5 nm |
| Unknown thickness of ITO layer |
| Unknown thickness of Al layer |
